hero.description: CodingGeh helps developers and businesses create amazing digital experiences with innovative solutions, modern technologies, and cutting-edge development practices.

about.title: About CodingGeh
about.description: We are a passionate team of developers and designers dedicated to creating amazing digital experiences and helping businesses thrive in the modern tech landscape.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to empower developers and businesses with cutting-edge coding solutions, modern development practices, and innovative technologies that drive digital transformation.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: We envision a world where every developer has access to the best tools, resources, and expertise needed to create amazing digital experiences and build successful products.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: CodingGeh offers a comprehensive range of development and design services to help your business succeed in the digital world.

web.title: Web Development
web.description: Modern web applications built with React, Vue, Svelte, and cutting-edge technologies.

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.description: Cross-platform mobile apps with React Native, Flutter, and native development.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Scalable backend systems with Node.js, Python, and cloud-native architectures.

design.title: UI/UX Design
design.description: Beautiful and intuitive user interfaces with modern design systems.

devops.title: DevOps & Cloud
devops.description: CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure, and deployment automation.

consulting.title: Code Consulting
consulting.description: Technical consulting, code reviews, and architecture guidance.

team.title: Meet the CodingGeh Team
team.description: Our passionate team of developers, designers, and tech enthusiasts dedicated to creating amazing digital experiences.

founder.name: CodingGeh
founder.description: Passionate full-stack developer with expertise in React, Vue, Svelte, and modern web technologies.

tech.name: Tech Team
tech.description: Experienced developers specializing in frontend, backend, and mobile development.

design.name: Design Team
design.description: Creative designers focused on creating beautiful and intuitive user experiences.

devops.name: DevOps Team
devops.description: Infrastructure experts ensuring smooth deployment and scalable cloud solutions.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Ready to start your next project? Get in touch with us today.

footer.description: Building the future of coding with innovative solutions, modern technologies, and cutting-edge development practices.
